方法详细信息

loadJobConfig

public static JobConf loadJobConfig(java.lang.String filename)
Parse dataX job configuration file.

参数：
filename - Job configure filename.
返回：
a JobConf instance which describes this Job configuration file.

loadPluginConfig

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,PluginConf> loadPluginConfig()
Parse plugins configuration file, get all plugin configurations。

返回：
a map mapping plugin name to plugin configurations。

loadEngineConfig

public static EngineConf loadEngineConfig()
Parse engine configuration file。

返回：
EngineConf.

loadScheduleURL

public static java.lang.String loadScheduleURL()
Parse engine configuration file, and get DataX Statistics report url. NOTE: This feature can be abandon.

返回：
DataX statistics report URL
